NANCY PELOSI AND CHUCK SCHUMER ARE THE REASON PPL HAVE RECEIVED HELP - THEY WROTE #FAMILIESFIRST AND #CARESACT , NOT @GOP . GOP ONLY CARE ABOUT CORPORATIONS.

WE ARE VOTING YOUR CROOKED ASSES OUT IN NOV.
